document_data.name: Asa wat
document_data.mainbody:
'''Asa wat''' was a type of stew available in [[Port Nyanzaru]] near the end of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Even at night the air [in [[Chult]]] is as thick and hot as a bowl of asa wat.|Guard Captain [[Uponga Naodha]]}}
document_data.Description: Asa wat consisted of [[tuna]] from the [[Shining Sea]] prepared in a stew of [[lentil]]s, [[red onion]]s, and spicy [[berbere]].
